Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Houston in 1979...
Injured on 4/7/1979 with a Sore Elbow, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/23/1981...
Injured on 9/25/1984 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/10/1987 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1987, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Had first career hit (triple) on 5/8/1988, off Terry Forster (TEX)...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/23/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $837,000 per year...
